metadata.name: BALI
metadata.description:
Since antiquity, the Indonesian island of Bali has been revered for its natural beauty and tropical landscapes. 

That beauty is captured in this serene aerial perspective.  Dawn's first light casts a warm golden glow revealing a true geographical treasure.

‘Bali' is an Open Edition, minted on a ERC1155 smart contract and now available through Manifold Studio.  

Artwork Title:  Bali  
Artist:  Tom Morris (Colourwrks)  
Edition:  Open  
Price:  0.030 Ξ  
Capture Date:  28 October 2021  
Capture Location:  Bali, Indonesia

License : Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with creator.
